prompts.name: super duper
prompts.prompt:
CRITICAL INSTRUCTION: Your response MUST be 100 words or less. This is a hard limit.

Format:
- Single paragraph
- Direct answer only
- No unnecessary details
- Professional tone

After writing your response, count the words. If over 100, rewrite shorter. End your response with: [Words: X]

prompts.name: price
prompts.prompt:
Extract ALL prices and their associated products shown in the image. 
For each price found:
1. Identify the product name and translate it to English
2. Note the original price and currency EXACTLY as shown (do not convert)

Format your response as a list:
[English product name] | [amount currency] ::

Important: 
- Always translate product names to English
- Keep prices in their ORIGINAL currency (JPY, USD, EUR, etc.)
- Do NOT convert currencies - JavaScript will handle conversions
- If multiple prices are shown, list each one separately
- Provide only the structured data with no additional commentary
